entry.title: Tranny Bear - V-Neck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

Introducing our stylish Unisex Jersey Short Sleeve V-Neck Tee, a perfect blend of comfort and fashion. This tee features a fun, eye-catching bear graphic that adds a playful touch to your wardrobe. Made from lightweight, breathable fabric, it’s ideal for year-round wear, whether you’re lounging at home, heading to a casual outing, or meeting friends for coffee. The V-neckline and retail fit give it a modern silhouette, making it a versatile choice for any occasion. Perfect for anyone who loves unique, whimsical designs, this tee makes a great gift for birthdays, celebrations, or just to brighten someone’s day. Celebrate the joy of everyday moments with this delightful addition to your collection!

Product features
- Side seams for durability and shape retention
- Elastic ribbed knit collar for comfort
- Shoulder tape for added stability
- Made from 100% cotton for a smooth feel
- Sustainably produced under humane practices

Care instructions
- Do not dryclean
- Machine wash: warm (max 40C or 105F)
- Non-chlorine: bleach as needed
- Tumble dry: low heat
- Iron, steam or dry: medium heat

entry.title: Lightning girl - V-Neck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

Lightning girl

 

“Her whole life, Mallory was made fun of to her classmates.  

Everything she wore was a hand me down from her big sister.  

One day, the girls in her class made fun of her so loud that the whole school laughed.  

It was at this point that she snapped her anger opened up some thing that she never knew that she had with her anger.

 Lightning came from her hands and picked her up from the ground. She decided to change.”

 

  • MRM

 


Looking good on both men and women, this soft jersey tee is comfortable enough to wear all day long. High quality print will make it an instant favorite in every wardrobe.

.: The lightweight fabric (4.2 oz/yd² (142 g/m²)) makes this shirt a versatile choice for any season while the 100% cotton fabric ensures a smooth, comfortable wearing experience.
.: The retail fit along with the V-neckline ensure a stylish silhouette and a trendy, versatile appearance in any setting, whether casual or semi-formal.
.: Bella+Canvas is part of the Fair Labor Association and is Platinum WRAP certified. This means all blank products manufactured in the US and internationally are made in humane, sustainable way, under a strict no-sweatshop policy.
.: All tees come with a tear-away label.
.: Fabric blend: Heather colors - 52% cotton, 48% polyester; Athletic Heather is 90% cotton, 10% polyester.

entry.title: Bees and cabin - V-Neck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

The men's fitted v-neck short sleeve tee adds a more nuanced look to the classic tee. The fabric is 100% cotton for solid colors, others will contain polyester. Perfect for any occasion, these custom tees are built without any side seams. The shoulders have twill tape for improved durability. The v-neck collar is ribbed knitting, so the fabric is unlikely to curl.

.: 100% ring-spun cotton (fiber content may vary for different colors)
.: Light fabric (4.5 oz/yd² (153 g/m²))
.: Semi fitted
.: Tear away label
.: Runs true to size

entry.title: Gorilla Chainsaw Massacre - V-neck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: V-neck
Price: 29.99

Gorilla Chainsaw Massacre

 

"Six youse ago, a baby gorilla was taken from the jungle, and sold to an animal park.  

The owner of the park screamed at him every night.

One day, a kid threw a rock really hard at him and hit him in the eye.  

He jumped over the railing, found a chainsaw, and the rest is history.”

 

-MRM

This piece is especially relevant for car enthusiasts and fashion-forward individuals seeking that classic look. Perfect for summer outings, casual gatherings, or simply relaxing at home, this V-neck is a great gift for birthdays, Father’s Day, or any celebratory occasion. - Elastic ribbed knit collar maintains its shape over time
- Self-fabric necktape ensures comfort and prevents stretching
